column4: Ok... I ran the ./configure&&make command (when I was CDed to the proper directory, I might add), it returned "bash: ./configure: No such file or directory"... so I decided to try the file name that I need to compile, I entered "./fa311v2.c&&make" returned "bash: ./fa311v2.c: Permision denied" I tried "sudo ./fa311v2.c&&make" returned "sudo: ./fa311v2.c: command not found" I'm stuck in a...
...bind here, and I have no clue how to get out
